name: McNet, the cost of the past
name_original: McNet, the cost of the past
description:
McNet, the cost of the past is a fast paced shooter in which you’ll play as McNet, a pistolero in the wild west who’s going to have to “clean” a saloon of the bandits gang that invaded it. But it seems that’s not the only thing he’ll have to clean…

Controls : Movements : WASD or ZQSD
Shooting/cleaning : left click
TNT throw : right click

Credits:

Thesandgamer: code

Asnwin: 3d

Fardier: 3d
